attributes.action: Give everyone their birthday off. If clashing with a day off give a day in lieu.
attributes.additional_details: For the whole country to have the day off various employment sectors are affected. This way everyone gets a day off to celebrate the day they were born.
attributes.background: There has been, for a long time, suggestions that the UK was to have another Bank/Public Holiday. However a date could not be agreed upon.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
